Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOC) that function reversibly in fuel cell (SOFC) and electrolytic (SOEC) modes offer the possibility of conversion and storage of energy through congruent production of electricity, hydrogen and syn-gas.
Titulo: Research Progress on the Interconnect Coating Technology for the SOFC/SOEC

Sentencas: Interconnect coating technologies for the solid oxide cells are particularly important.
Titulo: Research Progress on the Interconnect Coating Technology for the SOFC/SOEC

Sentencas: In this paper, the working environments of SOC at different operating modes were analyzed, and the available alloy materials, coating materials and coating techniques for SOC stack were reviewed.
Titulo: Research Progress on the Interconnect Coating Technology for the SOFC/SOEC
